channel.title: 1140 - Borders on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library
channel.description: Recent content in 1140 - Borders on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library

item.title: Fall 2022 Harvard Map Collection
item.description: GIS definitions. John Snow cholera map, 1854. John Snow cholera map, overlaid by a modern-day GIS heatmap layer. Offical Olympic National Park map. Graduated proportional symbol map showing 2020 population by state in the United States. Louisiana and Mississippi roadmap from the Harvard Map Collection. Louisiana and Mississippi roadmap from the Harvard Map Collection showing the New Orleans area. Land cover map of Louisiana from 1909 in the Harvard Map Collection.
